meanings.definition: Inclined or willing to take risks or embark on daring adventures.
meanings.sent1: The venturous explorer set out to discover new lands.
meanings.sent2: She admired his venturous spirit when he decided to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The venturous squirrel tried to reach the bird feeder by walking on a thin branch.
meanings.sent4: Her venturous decision to start her own business paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The venturous knight bravely faced the dragon to save the kingdom.

meanings.definition: Showing a willingness to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: The venturous child eagerly tried the unfamiliar food.
meanings.sent2: His venturous nature led him to explore the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent3: The venturous puppy attempted to jump over the puddle but fell in.
meanings.sent4: She took a venturous approach to solving the problem, which impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The venturous artist experimented with bold colors in her latest painting.
